meanings.sent1: The saughs in the park provide shade on sunny days.
meanings.sent2: I love the graceful branches of the saughs swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The saughs whispered secrets to each other in the gentle wind.
meanings.sent4: The saughs stood tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The saughs' leaves danced joyfully in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The wood of a willow tree.
meanings.sent1: She carved a beautiful sculpture out of saughs.
meanings.sent2: The table was crafted from sturdy saughs.
meanings.sent3: The saughs were transformed into a lovely set of chairs.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly cut saughs filled the workshop.
meanings.sent5: The saughs' grain added a unique pattern to the furniture.

meanings.definition: To make a rustling sound, as leaves in the wind.
meanings.sent1: The saughs rustled softly in the evening breeze.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the saughs rustling outside my window.
meanings.sent3: The saughs seemed to gossip with each other as they rustled.
meanings.sent4: The saughs rustled like a gentle melody in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The sound of saughs rustling was soothing and calming.
